topic.title: Keyboard Shortcuts for Finding the Next and Previous Match

body.p: Navigating from one match to the next or previous one is very easy to perform using the and keyboard shortcuts. They are useful for quickly repeating the last find action performed in the Find / Replace dialog box, taking into account the same find options.These shortcuts only take XPath expressions into account if the Find / Replace dialog box remains opened. Once you close it, the XPath expressions are no longer considered.
